feed.title: theme.park Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.17.0
entry.content:
New

  • New theme for Audiobookshelf by @PyrokineticDarkElf

Fixes

  • Update the other qbittorrent script with the new variable.

  • Adds QBITTORRENT_VERSION env that is used to download the correct version of the UI. If not set will download the latest stable version.

  • Update plex script for hotio path

  • Gitea: Fixes for 1.21.11

  • Blackberry: bump --text color by 69%

  • Revert npm shebang change

Changes

  • Docker: bump version to 3.19

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.18.0
entry.content:
New

  • Added Readarrtext logo addon: readarr-text-logo

  • Added Prowlarrtext logo addon: prowlarr-text-logo

  • Added Radarr anime logo addon: radarr-anime-logo

Fixed

  • Update audiobookshelf-base.css (https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/565)

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.19.0
entry.content:
Added

Favicon Support:

Adds new favicon mods.

The addons will change the favicon in the browser and icon on mobile etc.

[!NOTE] Implementation is through docker-mods/scripts. -e TP_ADDON={{ addon_name }} If adding multiple mods, enter them in an array separated by |. -e TP_ADDON=addon1|addon2 Or you can just replace the files in /app/bin/UI/Content/Images/Icons

The files can be found in the addons folder: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/tree/develop/css/addons/

  • readarr-alt-favicon
  • sonarr-4k-favicon
  • sonarr-anime-favicon
  • sonarr-anime-blue-favicon
  • radarr-4k-favicon
  • radarr-anime-favicon

CSS Fixes:

  • Fixed hover effect for series table rows in Sonarr. (css/base/sonarr/sonarr-base.css)
  • Fixed transparent background for settings tags in Servarr. (css/defaults/servarr-base.css)

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.19.1
entry.content: Fixes the themes.json docker-mods section. fetch.sh was broken.

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.20.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Deprecated docker builds for armv7

Other Changes

  • Sonarr, Radarr, Readarr Favicons by @GilbN in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/650
  • fix qbittorrent unthemed elements by @arminius-smh in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/659
  • Add Ros√© Pine theme by @juliamertz in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/661
  • Update unraid-base.css for Unraid 7 by @pnancke in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/665
  • Develop by @GilbN in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/668

New Contributors

  • @arminius-smh made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/659
  • @juliamertz made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/661
  • @pnancke made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/665

Full Changelog: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/compare/1.19.1...1.20.0
